mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_password, user_birthday, user_name, user_phonenumber, user_nickname, user_email) values(#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userBirthday}, #{userName}, #{userPhonenumber}, #{userNickname}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: SELECT distinct u.user_id, u.user_nickname, u.user_picture, CASE WHEN f.is_friend IS NOT NULL AND f.is_friend = true THEN true WHEN f.is_friend IS NOT NULL AND f.is_friend = false THEN false ELSE false END AS is_friend FROM user u LEFT JOIN friend f ON (u.user_id = f.user_id OR u.user_id = f.user_id2) AND (f.user_id = #{userId} OR f.user_id2 = #{userId}) WHERE u.user_id != #{userId}
